eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: RootChainChanged
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

functionDecorators.name: changeRootChain
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to change root chain address.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

functionDecorators.name: updateValidatorContractAddress
functionDecorators.description: Users must exit before this update or all funds may get lost.

functionDecorators.name: updateValidatorThreshold
functionDecorators.description: Change the number of validators required to allow a passed header root.
